src:
大巴黎、拜仁和尤文提前兩輪晉級歐冠16強

07 Nov 2019, 13:04

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月07日訊】當地時間11月6日，2019/20賽季歐冠小組賽第4輪再賽8場。巴黎聖日耳曼、拜仁慕尼黑和尤文圖斯本輪全取3分後，提前鎖定了一個16強名額。曼城和馬競遭遇爆冷，都沒有贏球，但並不會對兩隊的晉級造成大的影響。皇馬在主場6：0大勝後，基本上鎖定了小組第二。
大巴黎拜仁尤文提前晉級A組，巴黎聖日耳曼在主場1：0小勝比利時球隊布魯日，四戰全勝，提前兩輪晉級，同時他們有很大可能會以小組第一出線。同組的皇馬在主場6：0大勝土耳其球隊加拉塔薩雷，獲得7分，晉級形勢大好。
B組，拜仁在主場2：0擊敗奧林匹亞科斯，以不敗戰績晉級。這是主帥尼科‧科瓦奇下課後，拜仁的首場比賽。本賽季，拜仁在歐冠保持不敗，但在聯賽陷入麻煩，目前排名第四，落後「領頭羊」門興4分，上週末拜仁客場1：5慘敗法蘭克福後，科瓦奇下課。本週末德甲，拜仁將在主場迎戰勁敵多特。
C組，上一輪曼城在主場以5：1大勝亞特蘭大，本輪到客場，「藍月亮」遭遇到對手的頑強抵抗，最終兩隊1：1戰平。意大利球隊拿到了小組賽上寶貴的一分。本場比賽最後階段，門將布拉沃被紅牌罰下後，曼城由後衛沃克（Kyle Walker）客串門將，英格蘭人出色地完成了任務，還撲出了對手一次任意球攻門。雖然「藍月亮」沒能提前出線，但晉級基本已成定局。


歐冠小組賽第4輪，曼城客場1：1戰平亞特蘭大。比賽中，曼城後衛沃克（右）客串門將出場。(MARCO BERTORELLO/AFP)

D組，憑藉替補出場的科斯塔在傷停補時第2分鐘打入絕殺球，尤文圖斯在客場2：1擊敗了莫斯科中央陸軍。「老婦人」雖然不是4連勝，但3勝1平足以確保出線。同組的馬競在客場1：2負于勒沃庫森，遭遇首敗，但他們仍然領先排在第三名的中央陸軍4分，晉級形勢依然樂觀。
歐冠小組賽第四輪戰報A組：皇馬（西班牙）6：0加拉塔薩雷（土耳其）；巴黎聖日耳曼（法國）1：0布魯日（比利時）。B組：拜仁（德國）2：0奧林匹亞科斯（希臘）；貝爾格萊德紅星（塞爾維亞）0：4熱刺（英格蘭）。C組：亞特蘭大（意大利）1：1曼城（英格蘭）；薩格勒布（克羅地亞）3：3頓涅茨克礦工（烏克蘭）。D組：莫斯科火車頭（俄羅斯）1：2尤文（意大利）；勒沃庫森（德國）2：1馬德里競技（西班牙）。
──轉自《大紀元》
（責任編輯：葉萍）
本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/07/a102702008.html
text:
Big Paris, Bayern and Juventus advance to the top 16 in the Champions League

07 Nov 2019, 13:04

[New Tang Dynasty Beijing time, November 07, 2019] Local time on November 6, local 2019/20 season, the second round of the UEFA Champions League group rematch 8 games. After Paris Saint-Germain, Bayern Munich and Juventus took all three points, they locked in a top 16 in advance. Manchester City and Atletico were upset and didn't win, but they didn't have a big impact on the promotion of the two teams. Real Madrid basically locked the second group after a 6-0 victory at home.
Great Paris Bayern Juventus advanced to Group A in advance, Paris Saint-Germain wins the Belgian team Bruges at home 1:0 at home, winning four games, advance two rounds, and they are likely to qualify for the group's first qualifying. The same group of Real Madrid beat the Turkish team Galatasaray 6:0 at home, scored 7 points, the promotion situation is good.
In Group B, Bayern beat Olympiacos 2-0 at home and advanced to an unbeaten record. This is the first game of Bayern after the coach Niko Kovac. This season, Bayern remained unbeaten in the Champions League, but in the league is in trouble, currently ranked fourth, behind the "leader" Menxing 4 points, last weekend Bayern away 1:5 defeated Frankfurt, Kovacs class. This weekend, the Bundesliga, Bayern will be at home against the enemy Dortmund.
Group C, the last round of Manchester City beat Atlanta at 5:1 at home, this turn to the away game, "Blue Moon" encountered the opponent's stubborn resistance, and finally the two teams 1:1 draw. The Italian team got a valuable point in the group stage. In the final stage of the game, after the goalkeeper Bravo was sent off, Manchester City was a goalkeeper by defender Kyle Walker. The Englishman did a good job and saved the opponent a free kick. Although the "Blue Moon" failed to qualify in advance, the promotion is basically a foregone conclusion.


In the fourth round of the Champions League group match, Manchester City scored 1:1 draw against Atlanta. In the game, Manchester City defender Walker (right) came out with a goalkeeper. (MARCO BERTORELLO/AFP)

In Group D, Costa, who came off the bench, scored a lore in the second minute of injury time. Juventus defeated CSKA Moscow 2:1. Although the "old woman" is not a four-game winning streak, three wins and one draw are enough to ensure the qualifying. At the same time, Atletico lost to Leverkusen 1:2, but they still led the Central Army in fourth place. The promotion situation is still optimistic.
The third round of the Champions League group match report Group A: Real Madrid (Spain) 6:0 Galatasaray (Turkey); Paris Saint-Germain (France) 1:0 Bruges (Belgium). Group B: Bayern (Germany) 2:0 Olympiacos (Greece); Belgrade Red Star (Serbia) 0:4 Tottenham (England). Group C: Atlanta (Italy) 1:1 Manchester City (England); Zagreb (Croatia) 3:3 Shakhtar Donetsk (Ukraine). Group D: Moscow Locomotive (Russia) 1:2 Juventus (Italy); Leverkusen (Germany) 2:1 Atletico Madrid (Spain).
─Transfer from the Epoch Times
(Editor: Ye Ping)
